og.title: WDH merger looks very healthy

twitter.description: We all want access to the best medical care we can get and the recent announcement that Dover's Wentworth-Douglass Hospital is merging with Massachusetts General Hospital should be good news for patients and the area.Mass General is one of the nation's best hospitals and having access to its expertise will give WDH patients an added reason to stay in the area for their health care. It also will benefit Dover as WDH becomes even more of a regional hub for medical services.The news was
